name: Meowjectory
description:
In Meowjectory, the player has to devise and execute an optimal route through various obstacles in order to get the cat back into his napping box in time. 

At the beginning of each adventure, the player assigns jumping trajectories to the cat and other movable objects that could be either useful or dangerous. Player can observe how their projected trajectories play out, before repeating the procedure in the next turn. 

The cutesy and minimalistic 2D aesthetic comes with some challenges—don’t overfeed the cat to a degree at which it won’t fit into its final destination, the napping box. The goal is to get the cat back into the box at the end of each adventure
